idea-plugin.name: Emberly
idea-plugin.description:
Warm amber syntax highlighting themes for JetBrains IDEs.

Emberly brings a distinctive warm amber aesthetic to your IDE with carefully crafted color schemes that reduce eye strain while maintaining excellent readability.

Included Themes:

  • Emberly Carbon - Dark dimmed (#1e2228)
  • Emberly Noir - Dark (#252526)
  • Emberly Umbra - High contrast (#090c10)

Features:

  • Ayu Mirage syntax highlighting with warm amber tones
  • GitHub Dark UI styling (3 variants)
  • Full UI theming (Settings → Appearance → Theme)
  • Optimized for long coding sessions
